reviews.review: Ik heb echt lang gezocht naar een app als deze. Oefenen door steeds maar te herhalen, het werkt heel fijn!
I love the app, the only thing that would make it the perfect conjugation app is an english translation of the conjugated word!

Love it. This app only does a handful of things but it does it simply and well. If you are serious about learning Spanish, you also need to drill your verbs at some point. I think it might be most helpful when you are trying to go beyond the present.
Zeer gebruiksvriendelijke app en helpt je zeker bij het leren van Spaans.
Absolutely love the app, hopefully Dutch translations soon! Definitely worth the money too to help and support the brilliant makers

Great app for practicing conjugations and the full version is worth the money. I like the simplicity but also the versatility as you can adjust the settings to whichever tenses you would like to practice.
Fijne app om spaanse werkwoorden te automatiseren!
I love this app! I would give it 5 stars if you could practise translations of the verbs as well!
De Meest handige app om ww vervoegingen te oefenen.
Geweldige manier om vervoegingen te trainen
Fantastic app! Totally worth a couple of euros to completely personalize it. Please keep adding new verbs!
Perfect to learn tenses in Spanish or to rehearse them. I just keep forgetting some of them
